resources.string: Tap to download from the Play Store.
To open Allo on long-press (6.0+) or swipe-up of the home button, set Allistant as your Assist app in Settings.
Add the Allistant shortcut widget to quickly open Google Assistant. \n\nThis shortcut can also be triggered by automation apps like Tasker.

This service will be used by Allistant to launch Google Allo and automatically open the Google Assistant conversation activity. The actions performed by this app can be inspected by viewing the source code of this application avaialable on GitHub.
Please grant the accessibility permission to enable a direct shortcut to the Assistant.
